locationServiceDefault.title: OOPS!
locationServiceDefault.description:
You can't use the app without allowing the locations service. 
Please relaunch the app or go to settings and allow location usage.

locationServiceRestricted.title: OOPS!
locationServiceRestricted.description:
You can't use the app without allowing the locations service. 
The location is restricted on your device, please tell you, parent or administrator, to allow it so that you can use the app.

locationServiceDenied.title: OOPS!
locationServiceDenied.description:
You can't use the app without allowing the locations service.
Please relaunch the app or go to settings and allow location usage.

locationServicePermenantlyDenied.title: OOPS!
locationServicePermenantlyDenied.description:
You can't use the app without allowing the locations service, 
Please go to settings and allow location usage.

serverError.title: Something went wrong!
serverError.description: It's our fault, Please try again later.

fieldsEmptyError.title: Something went wrong!
fieldsEmptyError.description:
Some or all fields are empty! 
All fields are required.

passwordError.description:
The password you entered is invalid!

noUserError.description: This email is not associated with any account. Please create a new account.

defaultError.title: Something went wrong!
